characterDescription:
Fladm is an inner Sphere Vault guard in Thaylen City on the day Rysn and Vstim arrive there for a scheduled accounting of the queen's personal vault.
After raising the alarm when an attempt is made by a supposed member of the Queen's Guard, who followed Vstim into the vault, Fladm is killed by this guardsman, who fires a crossbow bolt down a row of gemstone racks, and it connects, as Fladm shouts out in pain.
Rysn finds his body at the threshold of the entry corridor to the vault, a bolt in him, his own crossbow on the floor beside him.
